## identityClaim() function

Specifies a property of the identity JWT to use in place of `sub::username` as the value to match against the owner field for authorization.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function identityClaim<SELF extends Authorization<any, any, any>>(this: SELF, property: string): Omit<SELF, "identityClaim">;
```

**Returns:**

Omit&lt;SELF, "identityClaim"&gt;

A copy of the Authorization object with the claim attached.
